DragoNN

The dragonn package implements deep neural networks (DNNs) for regulatory genomics, methods for DNN interpretation, and provides tutorials showcasing dragonn models using sequence simulations.

Overview Workshops View on GitHub Download .zip Download .tar.gz

Overview of DragoNN

The dragonn package implements deep neural networks (DNNs) for predictive modeling of regulatory genomics, feature importance methods such as DeepLIFT and in-silico mutagenesis to interpret DNNs, and sequence simulations to systematically assess model development and interpretation.

Installation

You can install dragonn from anaconda with:

conda install -c kundajelab dragonn

DragoNN is maintained by Kundaje Lab. This page was generated by GitHub Pages using the Cayman theme by Jason Long.
